attributes.action: Politicians supporting war to conscript their own offspring to front line combat zones
attributes.additional_details:
Any politician voting in favour or any future military conflicts, or supporting such conflicts, should be prepared to have members of their own families actively serve in combat conditions on the ground at the front line. Politicians should have the courage of their convictions to take the same risks as families of service personnel.

Any politician refusing to agree to this strategy must be barred from voting in any discussion involving military conflicts.
